meanings.definition: A fictional African nation in the Marvel Universe.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the heroes visited Wakanda to seek help.
meanings.sent2: Many fans dream of visiting Wakanda one day.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if Wakanda had flying cars and talking animals!
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a mini Wakanda, filled with the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The movie brought Wakanda to life with its stunning visuals.

meanings.definition: A place of advanced technology and rich culture in the Marvel comics.
meanings.sent1: The scientists in Wakanda created amazing inventions.
meanings.sent2: People in Wakanda cherish their traditions and modern advancements.
meanings.sent3: What if Wakanda had robots serving food in restaurants?
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a Wakanda of ideas, always innovating and creating.
meanings.sent5: The city gleamed like a futuristic Wakanda, with skyscrapers touching the sky.

meanings.definition: A term used to describe something futuristic or advanced.
meanings.sent1: The new phone design looks so Wakanda!
meanings.sent2: His ideas for the project were truly Wakanda.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world where everything is Wakanda-level technology!
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was out of this world, truly Wakanda style.
meanings.sent5: The car of the future will be like a ride from Wakanda, sleek and powerful.
